rows.translation: DESTROYED WILL BE the hands of Abu Lahab, and he himself will perish.

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, most benevolent, ever-merciful.

rows.arabic: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ
rows.translation: Of no avail shall be his wealth, nor what he has acquired.
rows.transliteration: mā aghnā `anhu māluhu wa mā kasab

rows.translation: He will be roasted in the fire,
And his wife, the portress of fire wood,
Will have a strap of fibre rope around her neck.
